markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. It is a random map representing city encounters.

## Usage

* After escaping the powderhouse during [Sabotage at the Brass Citadel](/sabotageAtTheBrassCitadel/), you'll be placed on this map in [stealth](/scoutingMode/).

'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is a random map representing city encounters.

==Usage==
* After escaping the powderhouse during [[Sabotage at the Brass Citadel]], you'll be placed on this map in [[Scouting Mode|stealth]].
